Package org.svvrl.goal.gui

Class LineLayout

java.lang.Object
org.svvrl.goal.gui.LineLayout
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.LayoutManager
public class LineLayout
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.LayoutManager
This class provides a layout manager that puts components in a line. The size of each component is determined by its preferred size and minimum size. If the line is vertical (or respectively horizontal), every component will have the same width (or respectively height).
Author:
"Ming-Hsien Tsai"
